name: Hellventure Demo
description:
Hellventure is an action horror game that combines rogue-lite elements.

While you are finding the treasures in the coffin, the monsters hidden in the coffin are just ready to move.

But you still have to bite the bullet to open the coffins cause you don't know which coffin is the entrance to the next level——your only hope.

Sell found treasures to unlock or upgrade items to help you identify and get rid of the scary monsters.

Your feedback means a lot to us, please leave your comment or contact to us by email or discord.

MagyuStudio@gmail.com

https://discord.gg/xexTENVCDM
